text.en: In you, all the ultimate qualities of knowledge and love are complete,
text.en-trans: khyentsé yönten tartuk kün dzok shing

text.en: You who are exalted as the white lotus, protector of all living beings,
text.en-trans: pekar tar ngak yichen kün gyi gön

text.en: You who eradicate all misery through your discourse on dependent arising,
text.en-trans: tenjung tam gyi duk kün zhil dzepé

text.en: Perfect guide, Lion of the Śākyas, I bow down before you.
text.en-trans: namdren shakya sengé chiwö chö

text.en: As in your glorious pronouncements, which foretold
text.en-trans: khyö ten jang né jang du dar gyur zhé

text.en: How the Dharma would spread further to the north,
text.en-trans: jitar pal gyi gur né ukyung tar

text.en: The Victor’s complete teaching reached the Land of Snows,
text.en-trans: khawé jong su gyalten yong khyab té

text.en: As an adornment for all the world, an excellence of fortune.
text.en-trans: dzamling gyen du gyurpa kalpa zang

text.en: Yet now, through the power of unwholesome actions,
text.en-trans: deta na yang kar min lé wang gi

text.en: The teachings are in decline, and the outer and inner world
text.en-trans: dengdir gyalten nyam shing nöchü kün

text.en: Are overwhelmed—beset by misery, on the verge of destruction.
text.en-trans: duk zé jik nyé nyam ngé ngang tsul di

text.en: It’s time to afford us protection in your great love and compassion!
text.en-trans: tsé chen tukjé kyobpé dü la bab

text.en: Thus, let us all, divine and human, from the Land of Snows,
text.en-trans: dé lé dakchak gangjong lhami kün

text.en: With our noble intentions and intense, fervent devotion,
text.en-trans: lhaksam dé dung drakpö nyer dum té

text.en: Offer this pure golden crest, the splendid mark of a sugata,
text.en-trans: deshek tsen zang tsuk tor ser jang tok

text.en: The supreme receptacle of a sage, and fine saffron robes.
text.en-trans: drangsong nö chok ngurmik gö zang ché

text.en: The vast twofold accumulation accruing from such offering,
text.en-trans: pulwé tsok nyi gyachen gang chi dang

text.en: Together with all the virtues related to the three times,
text.en-trans: zhenyang düsum dang drel gé tsok kün

text.en: I hereby dedicate, so that the Victor’s teachings, source of benefit for all,
text.en-trans: lhar ché drowé pendé jungwé né

text.en: Including the devas, may never decline but endure long into the future.
text.en-trans: gyalten mi nub yündu né chir ngo

text.en: For all embodied beings throughout the whole of space,
text.en-trans: khakhyab lüchen chi dang khyepardu

text.en: Especially the inhabitants of this continent of Jambudvīpa,
text.en-trans: dzambü dré ten ling di kyendro kün

text.en: May loving and compassionate thoughts and deeds increase
text.en-trans: jam dang nyingjé samjor gongpel né

text.en: And brutality, conflict and aggression cease for evermore.
text.en-trans: truktsö nö tsé namyang minjung shok

text.en: Poverty, oppression, tyranny, and persecution,
text.en-trans: ulpong nyamtak tsen nön nar chö dang

text.en: Infectious disease and disasters caused by environmental harm—
text.en-trans: nö kyi güpé né yam jung truk sok

text.en: May all such ills and adversity, both outer and inner, be pacified,
text.en-trans: chinang galkyen gü tsok kün zhi né

text.en: And may everyone enjoy the splendour of happiness and well-being for evermore.
text.en-trans: tamché ga dé pal la tak rol shok

text.en: Without sectarian bias but recognising the affinity of all followers
text.en-trans: ri su ma ché chinang chö tsul la

text.en: Of spiritual traditions, both Buddhist and non-Buddhist,
text.en-trans: zhuk kün pentsün nyen shin dushé kyi

text.en: May I never lack the gem-like radiance of pure perception,
text.en-trans: daknang norbü ö dang mi dralwar

text.en: And earnestly strive to benefit living beings as a whole.
text.en-trans: chik tu dro pen jawar lhurlen shok

text.en: For the cool land of Tibet in particular, may the weakened teachings
text.en-trans: lhakpar silden jong su gyalwé ten

text.en: Of the Victor be restored, never decline again but flourish and expand.
text.en-trans: nyampa sorchü mi nyam gongpel zhing

text.en: And with the newfound joy of spiritual and temporal autonomy,
text.en-trans: chösi rangwang dekyi sarpa yi

text.en: May Tibetan’s immediate and long-term wishes swiftly be fulfilled.
text.en-trans: bö bang tral yün dödön nyur drub shok

text.en: May all those whose dedication is helping to raise the umbrella
text.en-trans: gangchen zhing gi chösi jawé duk

text.en: Of dharmic and temporal activity throughout the Land of Snows
text.en-trans: dekpé sizhur tokpé kyewo kün

text.en: Maintain positive intentions, intelligence and steadfast determination,
text.en-trans: lhaksam namchö pungpa rabten ching

text.en: And may all beings be cared for by Avalokiteśvara, Holder of the Lotus.
text.en-trans: kyé kün chak na pemö jezung shok

text.en: In the realm of Dharma, may the collections of non-dharmic, unwholesome deeds
text.en-trans: chökyi zhing du chö min nyechö tsok

text.en: Be pacified through Dharma, and all that is positive, both dharmically and temporally,
text.en-trans: chökyi zhi zhing chösi lektsok kün

text.en: Be swiftly accomplished, according to the Dharma, by those with dharmic intention;
text.en-trans: chöden yi sam chö zhin nyur drub té

text.en: And may the truth of the Dharma definitively put an end to all that is non-dharmic.
text.en-trans: chökyi denpé chö min tar jé shok
